name: Offices
description: A hub of local governance or public administration; adventurers may seek permits, records, or appeal to authorities.
atmosphere: The offices have a formal, bureaucratic atmosphere with the scent of ink and parchment and the sound of quills scratching on official documents. The air carries the weight of administrative procedure and the essential nature of governance, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of official business and the complexities of civic administration.
